name: European Casino Association
memberOrga: The ECA has 28 members from across Europe (both EU and non-EU), the full list can be found on the ECA website: http://www.europeancasinoassociation.org/about-eca/eca-members/
goal: The ECA represents licensed land-based casinos in Europe, with 28 members and over 70,000 direct employees supporting local economies across Europe. The main purpose and objective of the ECA is to address and promote issues related to casinos and/or casino operations. In so doing, the ECA provides a focal point on casino matters for casino operators as well as for EU and national policy makers and stakeholders.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Anti-Money Laundering policies
Other gambling-related initiatives and activities from the EU institutions
